explanation: [0-0] In a bright bathroom, a man with tattoos on his arm wearing a black T-shirt is standing. He holds a white comb in his right hand and places it on the head of a little boy in a dark blue T-shirt standing in front of him. His left hand rests on the boy’s left shoulder. There are white tiles on the wall, and French subtitles appear at the bottom.

[0-4] First, the subtitles disappear. The man in the black T-shirt combs the hair of the little boy in the dark blue T-shirt. The scene changes to the man in the black T-shirt buttoning the clothes of the boy in the dark blue T-shirt. The picture changes again to the man in the black T-shirt sitting on the edge of the bathtub. In front of him stands a little girl with blonde hair wearing pink overalls. Some toiletries can be seen next to them. The man in the black T-shirt ties the blonde girl’s hair into a high ponytail as she looks ahead. The picture changes to the man in the black T-shirt sitting on the edge of the bathtub. Standing in front of him is a little girl with blonde hair wearing a white T-shirt with a leopard print. The man in the black T-shirt also ties the hair of the little girl in the white T-shirt into a ponytail. The picture switches to the white floor of the room. In the lower left corner, a pair of hands are tying the shoelaces of a child wearing grey socks with cartoon patterns and blue and white sneakers. The shoelaces are blue.

[4-10] Then the picture switches to the door of the house. The children line up and walk out of the house. Walking in front is the little girl in the pink jumpsuit, followed by the little girl in the white T-shirt and purple floral skirt, then the little boy in the yellow T-shirt, and finally the little boy in the dark blue T-shirt. They walk to the right one after another. The man in the black T-shirt walks last. When he gets to the door, he looks to the right, raises his right hand, and raises his index finger. Then he turns and goes back to the room. The screen changes, a right hand reaches out from the right, picks up the car key on the table, and there are audio, chargers and other items on the table. The picture changes, the man in the black T-shirt walks to the door, holds the key in his left hand, pulls the door with his right hand, the door slowly closes, French subtitles appear below, the man in the black T-shirt holds the key in both hands and stares ahead with wide eyes.

[10-18] Finally, the picture switches to the mud outside. The subtitles disappear. The little boy in the dark blue T-shirt is standing on the ground, covered in mud. He is holding a red object full of mud in his right hand, lifting it over his head and pouring the mud down. He has a branch in his left hand and mud on his face. The picture changes, and the blonde girl and the little girl in the white T-shirt have their hair down and are covered in mud. The blonde girl is holding a red toy shovel with both hands and putting it on the mud. She looks up to the left. The little girl in the white T-shirt raises her hands, holding a colorful object in her left hand. The picture switches to the little boy in the yellow T-shirt squatting on the ground, holding a handful of dirt in both hands, and throwing it to the left. The little boy in the dark blue T-shirt is bending over, digging in the ground with a red object in his right hand. The blonde girl is shoveling the dirt on the ground with a shovel in her right hand, looking up and smiling.
